description: A grab-and-go meal solution for a backcountry trip or to add to an emergency preparedness kit. Enough for 7 days, the kit contains 14 tasty entrees.Kit includes 14 vegetarian entrees: Mountain Chili (2 pouches), Forever Young Mac and Cheese (2 pouches), Mexican Style Veggie Bowl (2 pouches), Santa Fe Black Beans and Rice (2 pouches), Cheese Enchilada Ranchero (2 pouches), Three Cheese Lasagne (2 pouches), Himalayan Lentils and Rice (2 pouches).Meals provide an average of 1,200 calories per day.No cooking needed; simply add boiling water, stir, wait and enjoy.Meals have a 5-year shelf life.
name: AlpineAire 7 Day Vegetarian Meal Kit
